name: Airport Police Drug Sniffer Duty Simulator
name_original: Airport Police Drug Sniffer Duty Simulator
description:
Drug cartels are contineously trying to import and export every kind of drugs in airports of your country. These mafia men invest this drug money in more drug trafficking, assassination, land grabbing and terrorism. Play as the brave dog sniffer, sniff out these mafia men containing drugs, finish up their cartels. German Shepherd dog is trained to use their powerful sniff and smell sense to track drugs, criminal bags and other harmful things.

Dont let them pass through, dont let any one do this harmful activity, catch them and hand them over to police and they get the justice they deserve.


-> Realistic Airport terminal environment
-> Drugs gangesters arresting challenge
-> Airport terminal hackers catch
-> Advance crime challenging
-> german shephered hunter dogs
